cost

protected double cost(Target target,
                      Unit unit,
                      FeatureDefinition weights,
                      WeightFunc[] weightFunctions)
Compute the goodness-of-fit of a given unit for a given target

Overrides:
cost in class FFRTargetCostFunction
Parameters:
target - target unit
unit - candidate unit
weights - FeatureDefinition
weightFunctions - array of WeightFunctions
Returns:
a non-negative number; smaller values mean better fit, i.e. smaller cost.
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if featureName not available in featureDefinition

featureCost in class FFRTargetCostFunction

featureName - feature name
